name: PuttyApp
tag_list: iphone, ipod, itouch, ipad, apple, application, app, unique, entertainment, comedy, fun
overview: PuttyApp founded in March of 2010 with two applications in the Apple AppStore. It now has over 11 applications and continues to grow. Specializing in the iOS ecosystem, applications the ways and means of any Apple product user.
